Reference¶

Release:0.3
Date:June 09, 2013

Functions¶

Functional interface to planarity.

planarity.planarity_functions.is_planar(graph)[source]¶

Test planarity of graph.

planarity.planarity_functions.kuratowski_edges(graph)[source]¶

Return edges of forbidden subgraph of non-planar graph.

planarity.planarity_functions.ascii(graph)[source]¶

Draw text representation of a planar graph.

planarity.planarity_functions.write(graph, path='stdout')[source]¶

Write an adjacency list representation of graph to path.

planarity.planarity_functions.mapping(graph)[source]¶

Return dictionary of internal mapping of nodes to integers.

NetworkX Interface¶

NetworkX interface to planarity.

planarity.planarity_networkx.kuratowski_subgraph(graph)[source]¶

Return forbidden subgraph of nonplanar graph G.

planarity.planarity_networkx.pgraph_graph(graph)[source]¶

Return pgraph graph built from NetworkX graph.

planarity.planarity_networkx.networkx_graph(pgraph)[source]¶

Return NetworkX graph built from planarity pgraph.

planarity.planarity_networkx.draw(graph, labels=True)[source]¶

Draw planar graph with Matplotlib.
